          <title>
            <string language="en">Active transport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktiver Transport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transport actif</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transporte ativo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasporto attivo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενεργός μεταφορά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transporte activo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the role of active transport in the transfer of dissolved substances from the capillaries into the cells.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">active transport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">blood</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">capillaries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Circulatory system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">concentration gradient</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Diffusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolved substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Rolle des aktiven 
Transportes in der Übertragung der aufgelösten Substanzen von den 
Kapillaren in die Zellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le rôle du transport 
actif dans le transfert des substances dissoutes à partir des 
capillaires dans les cellules.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o papel do transporte 
ativo em transferência de substâncias dissolvidas dos capilares nas 
pilhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il ruolo di trasporto 
attivo nel trasferimento delle sostanze dissolte dai vasi capillari 
nelle cellule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το ρόλο της ενεργού 
μεταφοράς στη μεταφορά των διαλυμένων ουσιών από τα τριχοειδή 
αγγεία στα κύτταρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el papel del transporte
activo en la transferencia de sustancias disueltas de los tubos 
capilares en las células.</string>
          </description>
